content:
Based on the additional information you provided, here are a few additional items you may want to bring up during your inspection:

* The fact that the garage repairs took over a year to complete, and the impact that had on your use of the rental property.
* The fact that you were not able to use a part of the property you were paying for during that time.
* The poor communication and lack of notice provided by the landlord regarding the repairs, and the impact that had on your daily life.
* The fact that you often received notice of repairs with as little as 20 hours notice.
* The impact of the repairs and lack of notice on your ability to plan and use your time effectively.
* The fact that the repairs were done during a rent increase, and if it is fair or not
* That the landlord did not provide any compensation or alternative solution during this time.
* Ask for any kind of guarantee that this will not happen again in the future.
* Any other issues or concerns you have with the rental property that you would like to address.
